name: @vis.gl/react-google-maps
description: React components and hooks for using Google Maps .

scripts.build:microbundle: rm -rf dist/* && microbundle -o dist/index.js -f modern,umd --globals react=React,react-dom=ReactDOM --jsx React.createElement --no-compress --tsconfig tsconfig.build.json
scripts.start:microbundle: rm -rf dist/* && microbundle watch -o dist/index.js -f modern,umd --globals react=React,react-dom=ReactDOM --jsx React.createElement --no-compress --tsconfig tsconfig.build.json
scripts.test: jest && npm run linter && npm run typecheck && npm run formatter
scripts.version: npm run changelog && git checkout -b chore/release-${npm_pa ckage_version} && git add packages/library
scripts.postversion: git push -u origin chore/release-${npm_package_version} && git push --tags --no-verify
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run test && npm run build
